00039 void hsv_to_rgb(float h, float s, float v, float *r, float *g, float *b)
00040 {
00041     int i;
00042     float f, p, q, t;
00043 
00044     if (s == 0.0f) {
00045         *r = v;
00046         *g = v;
00047         *b = v;
00048     }
00049     else {
00050         h = (h - floorf(h)) * 6.0f;
00051 
00052         i = (int)floorf(h);
00053         f = h - i;
00054         p = v * (1.0f - s);
00055         q = v * (1.0f - (s * f));
00056         t = v * (1.0f - (s * (1.0f - f)));
00057 
00058         switch (i) {
00059             case 0:
00060                 *r = v;
00061                 *g = t;
00062                 *b = p;
00063                 break;
00064             case 1:
00065                 *r = q;
00066                 *g = v;
00067                 *b = p;
00068                 break;
00069             case 2:
00070                 *r = p;
00071                 *g = v;
00072                 *b = t;
00073                 break;
00074             case 3:
00075                 *r = p;
00076                 *g = q;
00077                 *b = v;
00078                 break;
00079             case 4:
00080                 *r = t;
00081                 *g = p;
00082                 *b = v;
00083                 break;
00084             case 5:
00085                 *r = v;
00086                 *g = p;
00087                 *b = q;
00088                 break;
00089         }
00090     }
00091 }

00093 void rgb_to_yuv(float r, float g, float b, float *ly, float *lu, float *lv)
00094 {
00095     float y, u, v;
00096     y = 0.299f * r + 0.587f * g + 0.114f * b;
00097     u = -0.147f * r - 0.289f * g + 0.436f * b;
00098     v = 0.615f * r - 0.515f * g - 0.100f * b;
00099 
00100     *ly = y;
00101     *lu = u;
00102     *lv = v;
00103 }
00104 
00105 void yuv_to_rgb(float y, float u, float v, float *lr, float *lg, float *lb)
00106 {
00107     float r, g, b;
00108     r = y + 1.140f * v;
00109     g = y - 0.394f * u - 0.581f * v;
00110     b = y + 2.032f * u;
00111 
00112     *lr = r;
00113     *lg = g;
00114     *lb = b;
00115 }
00116 
00117 /* The RGB inputs are supposed gamma corrected and in the range 0 - 1.0f
00118  *
00119  * Output YCC have a range of 16-235 and 16-240 except with JFIF_0_255 where the range is 0-255 */
00120 void rgb_to_ycc(float r, float g, float b, float *ly, float *lcb, float *lcr, int colorspace)
00121 {
00122     float sr, sg, sb;
00123     float y = 128.f, cr = 128.f, cb = 128.f;
00124 
00125     sr = 255.0f * r;
00126     sg = 255.0f * g;
00127     sb = 255.0f * b;
00128 
00129     switch (colorspace) {
00130         case BLI_YCC_ITU_BT601:
00131             y = (0.257f * sr) + (0.504f * sg) + (0.098f * sb) + 16.0f;
00132             cb = (-0.148f * sr) - (0.291f * sg) + (0.439f * sb) + 128.0f;
00133             cr = (0.439f * sr) - (0.368f * sg) - (0.071f * sb) + 128.0f;
00134             break;
00135         case BLI_YCC_ITU_BT709:
00136             y = (0.183f * sr) + (0.614f * sg) + (0.062f * sb) + 16.0f;
00137             cb = (-0.101f * sr) - (0.338f * sg) + (0.439f * sb) + 128.0f;
00138             cr = (0.439f * sr) - (0.399f * sg) - (0.040f * sb) + 128.0f;
00139             break;
00140         case BLI_YCC_JFIF_0_255:
00141             y = (0.299f * sr) + (0.587f * sg) + (0.114f * sb);
00142             cb = (-0.16874f * sr) - (0.33126f * sg) + (0.5f * sb) + 128.0f;
00143             cr = (0.5f * sr) - (0.41869f * sg) - (0.08131f * sb) + 128.0f;
00144             break;
00145         default:
00146             assert(!"invalid colorspace");
00147     }
00148 
00149     *ly = y;
00150     *lcb = cb;
00151     *lcr = cr;
00152 }
00153 
00154 
00155 /* YCC input have a range of 16-235 and 16-240 except with JFIF_0_255 where the range is 0-255 */
00156 /* RGB outputs are in the range 0 - 1.0f */
00157 
00158 /* FIXME comment above must be wrong because BLI_YCC_ITU_BT601 y 16.0 cr 16.0 -> r -0.7009 */
00159 void ycc_to_rgb(float y, float cb, float cr, float *lr, float *lg, float *lb, int colorspace)
00160 {
00161     float r = 128.f, g = 128.f, b = 128.f;
00162 
00163     switch (colorspace) {
00164         case BLI_YCC_ITU_BT601:
00165             r = 1.164f * (y - 16.0f) + 1.596f * (cr - 128.0f);
00166             g = 1.164f * (y - 16.0f) - 0.813f * (cr - 128.0f) - 0.392f * (cb - 128.0f);
00167             b = 1.164f * (y - 16.0f) + 2.017f * (cb - 128.0f);
00168             break;
00169         case BLI_YCC_ITU_BT709:
00170             r = 1.164f * (y - 16.0f) + 1.793f * (cr - 128.0f);
00171             g = 1.164f * (y - 16.0f) - 0.534f * (cr - 128.0f) - 0.213f * (cb - 128.0f);
00172             b = 1.164f * (y - 16.0f) + 2.115f * (cb - 128.0f);
00173             break;
00174         case BLI_YCC_JFIF_0_255:
00175             r = y + 1.402f * cr - 179.456f;
00176             g = y - 0.34414f * cb - 0.71414f * cr + 135.45984f;
00177             b = y + 1.772f * cb - 226.816f;
00178             break;
00179         default:
00180             assert(!"invalid colorspace");
00181     }
00182     *lr = r / 255.0f;
00183     *lg = g / 255.0f;
00184     *lb = b / 255.0f;
00185 }
00186 
00187 void hex_to_rgb(char *hexcol, float *r, float *g, float *b)
00188 {
00189     unsigned int ri, gi, bi;
00190 
00191     if (hexcol[0] == '#') hexcol++;
00192 
00193     if (sscanf(hexcol, "%02x%02x%02x", &ri, &gi, &bi) == 3) {
00194         *r = ri / 255.0f;
00195         *g = gi / 255.0f;
00196         *b = bi / 255.0f;
00197         CLAMP(*r, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00198         CLAMP(*g, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00199         CLAMP(*b, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00200     }
00201     else {
00202         /* avoid using un-initialized vars */
00203         *r = *g = *b = 0.0f;
00204     }
00205 }
00206 
00207 void rgb_to_hsv(float r, float g, float b, float *lh, float *ls, float *lv)
00208 {
00209     float h, s, v;
00210     float cmax, cmin, cdelta;
00211     float rc, gc, bc;
00212 
00213     cmax = r;
00214     cmin = r;
00215     cmax = (g > cmax ? g : cmax);
00216     cmin = (g < cmin ? g : cmin);
00217     cmax = (b > cmax ? b : cmax);
00218     cmin = (b < cmin ? b : cmin);
00219 
00220     v = cmax; /* value */
00221     if (cmax != 0.0f)
00222         s = (cmax - cmin) / cmax;
00223     else {
00224         s = 0.0f;
00225     }
00226     if (s == 0.0f)
00227         h = -1.0f;
00228     else {
00229         cdelta = cmax - cmin;
00230         rc = (cmax - r) / cdelta;
00231         gc = (cmax - g) / cdelta;
00232         bc = (cmax - b) / cdelta;
00233 
00234         if (r == cmax) {
00235             h = bc - gc;
00236         }
00237         else if (g == cmax) {
00238             h = 2.0f + rc - bc;
00239         }
00240         else {
00241             h = 4.0f + gc - rc;
00242         }
00243 
00244         h = h * 60.0f;
00245         if (h < 0.0f)
00246             h += 360.0f;
00247     }
00248 
00249     *ls = s;
00250     *lh = h / 360.0f;
00251     if (*lh < 0.0f) *lh = 0.0f;
00252     *lv = v;
00253 }
00254 
00255 void rgb_to_hsv_compat(float r, float g, float b, float *lh, float *ls, float *lv)
00256 {
00257     float orig_h = *lh;
00258     float orig_s = *ls;
00259 
00260     rgb_to_hsv(r, g, b, lh, ls, lv);
00261 
00262     if (*lv <= 0.0f) {
00263         *lh = orig_h;
00264         *ls = orig_s;
00265     }
00266     else if (*ls <= 0.0f) {
00267         *lh = orig_h;
00268     }
00269 
00270     if (*lh == 0.0f && orig_h >= 1.0f) {
00271         *lh = 1.0f;
00272     }
00273 }

00275 /*http://brucelindbloom.com/index.html?Eqn_RGB_XYZ_Matrix.html */
00276 
00277 void xyz_to_rgb(float xc, float yc, float zc, float *r, float *g, float *b, int colorspace)
00278 {
00279     switch (colorspace) {
00280         case BLI_XYZ_SMPTE:
00281             *r = (3.50570f * xc) + (-1.73964f * yc) + (-0.544011f * zc);
00282             *g = (-1.06906f * xc) + (1.97781f * yc) + (0.0351720f * zc);
00283             *b = (0.0563117f * xc) + (-0.196994f * yc) + (1.05005f * zc);
00284             break;
00285         case BLI_XYZ_REC709_SRGB:
00286             *r = (3.240476f * xc) + (-1.537150f * yc) + (-0.498535f * zc);
00287             *g = (-0.969256f * xc) + (1.875992f * yc) + (0.041556f * zc);
00288             *b = (0.055648f * xc) + (-0.204043f * yc) + (1.057311f * zc);
00289             break;
00290         case BLI_XYZ_CIE:
00291             *r = (2.28783848734076f * xc) + (-0.833367677835217f * yc) + (-0.454470795871421f * zc);
00292             *g = (-0.511651380743862f * xc) + (1.42275837632178f * yc) + (0.0888930017552939f * zc);
00293             *b = (0.00572040983140966f * xc) + (-0.0159068485104036f * yc) + (1.0101864083734f * zc);
00294             break;
00295     }
00296 }

00298 /* we define a 'cpack' here as a (3 byte color code) number that can be expressed like 0xFFAA66 or so.
00299  * for that reason it is sensitive for endianness... with this function it works correctly
00300  */
00301 
00302 unsigned int hsv_to_cpack(float h, float s, float v)
00303 {
00304     short r, g, b;
00305     float rf, gf, bf;
00306     unsigned int col;
00307 
00308     hsv_to_rgb(h, s, v, &rf, &gf, &bf);
00309 
00310     r = (short) (rf * 255.0f);
00311     g = (short) (gf * 255.0f);
00312     b = (short) (bf * 255.0f);
00313 
00314     col = (r + (g * 256) + (b * 256 * 256));
00315     return col;
00316 }
00317 
00318 unsigned int rgb_to_cpack(float r, float g, float b)
00319 {
00320     int ir, ig, ib;
00321 
00322     ir = (int)floor(255.0f * r);
00323     if (ir < 0) ir = 0;
00324     else if (ir > 255) ir = 255;
00325     ig = (int)floor(255.0f * g);
00326     if (ig < 0) ig = 0;
00327     else if (ig > 255) ig = 255;
00328     ib = (int)floor(255.0f * b);
00329     if (ib < 0) ib = 0;
00330     else if (ib > 255) ib = 255;
00331 
00332     return (ir + (ig * 256) + (ib * 256 * 256));
00333 }
00334 
00335 void cpack_to_rgb(unsigned int col, float *r, float *g, float *b)
00336 {
00337 
00338     *r = (float)((col) & 0xFF);
00339     *r /= 255.0f;
00340 
00341     *g = (float)(((col) >> 8) & 0xFF);
00342     *g /= 255.0f;
00343 
00344     *b = (float)(((col) >> 16) & 0xFF);
00345     *b /= 255.0f;
00346 }

00348 void rgb_uchar_to_float(float col_r[3], const unsigned char col_ub[3])
00349 {
00350     col_r[0] = ((float)col_ub[0]) / 255.0f;
00351     col_r[1] = ((float)col_ub[1]) / 255.0f;
00352     col_r[2] = ((float)col_ub[2]) / 255.0f;
00353 }

00356 {
00357     col_r[0] = ((float)col_ub[0]) / 255.0f;
00358     col_r[1] = ((float)col_ub[1]) / 255.0f;
00359     col_r[2] = ((float)col_ub[2]) / 255.0f;
00360     col_r[3] = ((float)col_ub[3]) / 255.0f;
00361 }

00376 void gamma_correct(float *c, float gamma)
00377 {
00378     *c = powf((*c), gamma);
00379 }
00380 
00381 float rec709_to_linearrgb(float c)
00382 {
00383     if (c < 0.081f)
00384         return (c < 0.0f) ? 0.0f : c * (1.0f / 4.5f);
00385     else
00386         return powf((c + 0.099f) * (1.0f / 1.099f), (1.0f / 0.45f));
00387 }
00388 
00389 float linearrgb_to_rec709(float c)
00390 {
00391     if (c < 0.018f)
00392         return (c < 0.0f) ? 0.0f : c * 4.5f;
00393     else
00394         return 1.099f * powf(c, 0.45f) - 0.099f;
00395 }
00396 
00397 float srgb_to_linearrgb(float c)
00398 {
00399     if (c < 0.04045f)
00400         return (c < 0.0f) ? 0.0f : c * (1.0f / 12.92f);
00401     else
00402         return powf((c + 0.055f) * (1.0f / 1.055f), 2.4f);
00403 }
00404 
00405 float linearrgb_to_srgb(float c)
00406 {
00407     if (c < 0.0031308f)
00408         return (c < 0.0f) ? 0.0f : c * 12.92f;
00409     else
00410         return 1.055f * powf(c, 1.0f / 2.4f) - 0.055f;
00411 }
00412 
00413 void minmax_rgb(short c[])
00414 {
00415     if (c[0] > 255) c[0] = 255;
00416     else if (c[0] < 0) c[0] = 0;
00417     if (c[1] > 255) c[1] = 255;
00418     else if (c[1] < 0) c[1] = 0;
00419     if (c[2] > 255) c[2] = 255;
00420     else if (c[2] < 0) c[2] = 0;
00421 }
00422 
00423 /*If the requested RGB shade contains a negative weight for
00424  * one of the primaries, it lies outside the color gamut
00425  * accessible from the given triple of primaries.  Desaturate
00426  * it by adding white, equal quantities of R, G, and B, enough
00427  * to make RGB all positive.  The function returns 1 if the
00428  * components were modified, zero otherwise.*/
00429 int constrain_rgb(float *r, float *g, float *b)
00430 {
00431     float w;
00432 
00433     /* Amount of white needed is w = - min(0, *r, *g, *b) */
00434 
00435     w = (0 < *r) ? 0 : *r;
00436     w = (w < *g) ? w : *g;
00437     w = (w < *b) ? w : *b;
00438     w = -w;
00439 
00440     /* Add just enough white to make r, g, b all positive. */
00441 
00442     if (w > 0) {
00443         *r += w;
00444         *g += w;
00445         *b += w;
00446         return 1; /* Color modified to fit RGB gamut */
00447     }
00448 
00449     return 0; /* Color within RGB gamut */
00450 }

00452 float rgb_to_grayscale(const float rgb[3])
00453 {
00454     return 0.3f * rgb[0] + 0.58f * rgb[1] + 0.12f * rgb[2];
00455 }
00456 
00457 unsigned char rgb_to_grayscale_byte(const unsigned char rgb[3])
00458 {
00459     return (76 * (unsigned short) rgb[0] + 148 * (unsigned short) rgb[1] + 31 * (unsigned short) rgb[2]) / 255;
00460 }
00461 
00462 float rgb_to_luma(const float rgb[3])
00463 {
00464     return 0.299f * rgb[0] + 0.587f * rgb[1] + 0.114f * rgb[2];
00465 }
00466 
00467 unsigned char rgb_to_luma_byte(const unsigned char rgb[3])
00468 {
00469     return (76 * (unsigned short) rgb[0] + 150 * (unsigned short) rgb[1] + 29 * (unsigned short) rgb[2]) / 255;
00470 }
00471 
00472 /* ********************************* lift/gamma/gain / ASC-CDL conversion ********************************* */
00473 
00474 void lift_gamma_gain_to_asc_cdl(float *lift, float *gamma, float *gain, float *offset, float *slope, float *power)
00475 {
00476     int c;
00477     for (c = 0; c < 3; c++) {
00478         offset[c] = lift[c] * gain[c];
00479         slope[c] = gain[c] * (1.0f - lift[c]);
00480         if (gamma[c] == 0)
00481             power[c] = FLT_MAX;
00482         else
00483             power[c] = 1.0f / gamma[c];
00484     }
00485 }

00489 /* Applies an hue offset to a float rgb color */
00490 void rgb_float_set_hue_float_offset(float rgb[3], float hue_offset)
00491 {
00492     float hsv[3];
00493 
00494     rgb_to_hsv(rgb[0], rgb[1], rgb[2], hsv, hsv + 1, hsv + 2);
00495 
00496     hsv[0] += hue_offset;
00497     if (hsv[0] > 1.0f) hsv[0] -= 1.0f;
00498     else if (hsv[0] < 0.0f) hsv[0] += 1.0f;
00499 
00500     hsv_to_rgb(hsv[0], hsv[1], hsv[2], rgb, rgb + 1, rgb + 2);
00501 }
00502 
00503 /* Applies an hue offset to a byte rgb color */
00504 void rgb_byte_set_hue_float_offset(unsigned char rgb[3], float hue_offset)
00505 {
00506     float rgb_float[3];
00507 
00508     rgb_uchar_to_float(rgb_float, rgb);
00509     rgb_float_set_hue_float_offset(rgb_float, hue_offset);
00510     rgb_float_to_uchar(rgb, rgb_float);
00511 }

00513 
00514 /* fast sRGB conversion
00515  * LUT from linear float to 16-bit short
00516  * based on http://mysite.verizon.net/spitzak/conversion/
00517  */
00518 
00519 float BLI_color_from_srgb_table[256];
00520 unsigned short BLI_color_to_srgb_table[0x10000];
00521 
00522 static unsigned short hipart(const float f)
00523 {
00524     union {
00525         float f;
00526         unsigned short us[2];
00527     } tmp;
00528 
00529     tmp.f = f;
00530 
00531 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00532     return tmp.us[0];
00533 #else
00534     return tmp.us[1];
00535 #endif
00536 }
00537 
00538 static float index_to_float(const unsigned short i)
00539 {
00540 
00541     union {
00542         float f;
00543         unsigned short us[2];
00544     } tmp;
00545 
00546     /* positive and negative zeros, and all gradual underflow, turn into zero: */
00547     if (i < 0x80 || (i >= 0x8000 && i < 0x8080)) return 0;
00548     /* All NaN's and infinity turn into the largest possible legal float: */
00549     if (i >= 0x7f80 && i < 0x8000) return FLT_MAX;
00550     if (i >= 0xff80) return -FLT_MAX;
00551 
00552 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00553     tmp.us[0] = i;
00554     tmp.us[1] = 0x8000;
00555 #else
00556     tmp.us[0] = 0x8000;
00557     tmp.us[1] = i;
00558 #endif
00559 
00560     return tmp.f;
00561 }
00562 
00563 void BLI_init_srgb_conversion(void)
00564 {
00565     static int initialized = 0;
00566     int i, b;
00567 
00568     if (initialized) return;
00569     initialized = 1;
00570 
00571     /* Fill in the lookup table to convert floats to bytes: */
00572     for (i = 0; i < 0x10000; i++) {
00573         float f = linearrgb_to_srgb(index_to_float(i)) * 255.0f;
00574         if (f <= 0) BLI_color_to_srgb_table[i] = 0;
00575         else if (f < 255) BLI_color_to_srgb_table[i] = (unsigned short) (f * 0x100 + 0.5f);
00576         else BLI_color_to_srgb_table[i] = 0xff00;
00577     }
00578 
00579     /* Fill in the lookup table to convert bytes to float: */
00580     for (b = 0; b <= 255; b++) {
00581         float f = srgb_to_linearrgb(((float)b) * (1.0f / 255.0f));
00582         BLI_color_from_srgb_table[b] = f;
00583         i = hipart(f);
00584         /* replace entries so byte->float->byte does not change the data: */
00585         BLI_color_to_srgb_table[i] = b * 0x100;
00586     }
00587 }
